0: Great stay on a return trip home
My wife and I stayed at the Hilton Toronto Airport Hotel Suites on April 10 2016 as our last stop on a three week vacation before flying home
This hotel is perfect for anybody who is in town for business or vacation
We always stay here when headed out on a trip
We were here for a quick business trip
I just came back from a business trip and had the pleasure to stay there for 2 nights
useful when Travelling as a family and all 2 to 3 meal vouches are given by the airline
Very charming little spot for a short getaway
It turned an overnight stay between flights into a holiday experience
Was perfect for a business trip and accommodating
1: So because the room was small we constantly tripped over them
Myself and family stayed there before boarding our early morning flight and it was awful
Actually I saw two shuttles from Holiday Inn passing through while I was waiting for their shuttles
I explained that I had also tripped over an ottoman in the far corner of the room while trying to locate the mechanism to turn on the corner floor lamp
because our stay was short this time we did not need it resolved however last trip we had to get a second entry point to the Wifi which solved the issue
Normal airport hotel less Hilton more holiday inn
When we got back after our vacation the lobby was completely re arranged and we thought we were at the wrong hotel tired after a long day of travel
We had high expectations and it certainly dampened our trip
Had to walk to Holiday Inn to get a meal
However my last trip there was n’t the night I expected
